Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide 3 (AI Predicted AMPs, Arg-rich, XXA, UCLl1c)
Sequence Information.Source: AI predicted, Derived from UniProt ID: Q53HI1, human protein

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (47.37%) toN-[RLLR]3R: 31%, L=F=A=Y=K: 13%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 3.1 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 1.6 uM), A. baumannii (MIC 0.8 uM), S. enterica (MIC 3.1 uM), S. aureus (MIC 3.1 uM), E. faecium (MIC 3.1 uM), and M. luteus (MIC 3.1 uM).In vitro toxicity:  horse RBC: 33% hemolysis at 150 uM (HC50 >100 uM), less hemo.lytic. HepG2 cell (IC50 57 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 5-10 mM SDS.
Literature Information.Author: Ramos-Llorens M, Bello-Madruga R, Valle J, Andreu D, Torrent M. 2024
Literature Information.Title: PyAMPA: a high-throughput prediction and optimization tool for antimicrobial peptides.
